item.title: resumé
item.description:
Tarik Massac

  • email: hello@tmass.ac
  • github: github

Experience

Software Engineer II

American Express
April 2023 — June 2025

  • Led development of deceased account transfer feature processing 500+ account transitions monthly, preserving customer history and reducing account closure rates by 30%.
  • Led development and release of NFT Passport product enabling users to mint NFTs based upon travel behavior to drive digital engagement and increase travel spending.
  • Led team handling production bug triage which affected 20% of new customer signups in European markets for new products.
  • Built Splunk monitoring dashboard used by 15+ engineers for API health tracking, reducing mean time to detection (MTTD) and enabling proactive alerting that prevented 10+ production incidents.
  • Maintained Customer 360 Java APIs processing 50M+ daily requests with 99.95% uptime, supporting global customer insights across 20+ markets and 100M+ customer records. • Mentored 2 junior engineers through onboarding and code reviews, reducing ramp-up time from 3 months to 6 weeks and improving team velocity.

Software Engineer

Bandcamp
April 2018 — April 2023
